summary: New face and hair for Serana from Dawnguard
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][color=yellow]Not supporting this mod any longer. Use at your own risk.[/color][/size]

This mod changes appearance of Serana from Dawnguard.
[u]You need Dawnguard DLC to be installed in order to use this mod.[/u]

[color=red]This mod is not compatible with the mod that changes any assets of Serana.[/color]
(It is compatible with \"Vampire Lord drain with Serana fixed\" by Thivus.)

In this mod, Serana uses her own skin textures and UNP body (which means you don\\\'t have to worry about body/face mod conflicts). There is no required file to be downloaded but please check out the credits for awesome mods that I have used for this.


[size=15][color=red][b]Installation[/b][/color][/size]

Manually copy & paste the Data folder to your Skyrim folder.
It\\\'s generally C:\\\\Program Files (x86)\\\\Steam\\\\steamapps\\\\common\\\\skyrim\\\\
Make sure to check YakshaRace.esp in Data files in the game launcher.


[size=15][color=red][b]Uninstallation[/b][/color][/size]

Delete these files:
Data\\\\meshes\\\\actors\\\\character\\\\Serana
Data\\\\meshes\\\\actors\\\\character\\\\FaceGenData\\\\FaceGeom\\\\Dawnguard.esm\\\\00002B6C.NIF
Data\\\\textures\\\\actors\\\\character\\\\Serana
Data\\\\textures\\\\actors\\\\character\\\\FaceGenData\\\\FaceTint\\\\Dawnguard.esm\\\\00002B6C.tga
Data\\\\textures\\\\actors\\\\character\\\\FaceGenData\\\\FaceTint\\\\Dawnguard.esm\\\\00002B6C.dds
Data\\\\serana.esp


[size=15][color=red][b]Credits[/b][/color][/size]

[b]DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709[/url]

[b]CBBE skin texture V2 V3 plus Thepal and UNP compatible by navetsea[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6554]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6554[/url]

[b]Enhanced Character Edit by tktk[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12951]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12951[/url]

[b]Girls of Skyrim by basskimm[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21038]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21038[/url]

[b]ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168[/url]

[b]Bethesda[/b]
author: Hello Santa
